Course Description: THE STUDENT WILL USE COMPUTER SOFTWARE AND FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING APPLICATIONS TO ANALYZE ACCOUNTING RECORDS, PREPARE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, AND COMPILE EXCEL SPREADSHEETS. THE STUDENT WILL LEARN, WITH TUTORIAL HELP AND PROBLEM-SOLVING, THE CONCEPTS NEEDED TO ACHIEVE THE OBJECTIVES OF ACG2011.
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major:
COMPETENCY 1: THE STUDENT WILL REINFORCE AND APPLY THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF ANALYZING AND RECORDING FINANCIAL TRANSACTIONS BY:
1. ENTERING JOURNAL ENTRIES ON VARIOUS FINANCIAL TOPICS IN A COMPUTERIZED GENERAL LEDGER SOFTWARE.
 
COMPETENCY 2: THE STUDENT WILL REINFORCE AND APPLY THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF RECEIVABLES BY:
1. PREPARING AGING SCHEDULES IN EXCEL.
 
COMPETENCY 3: THE STUDENT WILL APPLY THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF FIXED ASSETS AND DEPRECIATION BY:
1. PREPARING DEPRECIATION SCHEDULES USING DIFFERENT METHODS OF DEPRECIATION IN EXCEL.
 
COMPETENCY 4: THE STUDENT WILL APPLY THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF PAYROLL BY:
1. PREPARING PAYROLL RELATED SPREADSHEETS IN EXCEL.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
